items.sentence: You can probably buy one of these cheaper somewhere else.
Why didn\'t you tell me that you didn\'t know what to do?
Do you want to go out to a movie with me on Friday night?
Tom would\'ve been able to do that if he\'d tried harder.
Are you telling me Tom doesn\'t know how to speak French?
I\'m sure Tom wouldn\'t mind it if you used his umbrella.
Why don\'t you go to the park and play with your friends?
Are you sure you don\'t want to go to Australia with Tom?
Could you please tell Tom why you don\'t want to do that?
I was so busy working that I completely forgot about Tom.
